pages.text: These Fadenia are species of Caseodonts which lived during the Permian to Triassic periods. They were much smaller than their Carboniferous relative and they only grew to about 1.6-2 meters long, and had a tooth whorl similar to other caseodonts. They mainly inhabited marine environments and probably actively hunted.
